title: New: E X R O Y A L E – Give It Up
body:
**E X R O Y A L E**.

Gaps between letters, slightly quirky artwork and a present lack of information / identity to the group. Yep, so it’s a game we’ve seen played out numerous times before, and in truth, there will come a day where it’s no longer exciting, yet E X R O Y A L E’s debut track suggests that for the moment, there’s perhaps more to them than simple, overplayed marketing gimmicks. _Give It Up_ is a slice of electro-pop heaven, not too far from the likes of CitR favourites Panama Wedding and Pacific Air, and exhausted internet promotional methods aside, there’s certainly something here.

excerpt.short: E X R O Y A L E.
